I wonder what Jack is doing.
It is time that he should go to school.
I'll find out what he is doing, Mom.
Jack, what are you doing? Time to go to school!
It's already 4 p.m. It's time to take a swimming lesson.
I wonder how we are going to the swimming pool.
Don't worry. Dad will give you a ride.
Let's go out and play soccer, Jeff.
Sorry, but I can't. It is time to do my math homework.
Umm, you are always busy. I wonder when you can play with me.
